-text filter="h" heres some fake mako ${syntax} <%def name="x()">${x} - text filter="h" heres some fake mako ${syntax} <%def name="x()">${x} - text filter="h" = syntax <%def name="x()">${x} -text heres some fake mako ${syntax} <%def name="x()">${x} -text , heres some fake mako ${syntax} <%def name="x()">${x}
